data.name: Sexy Guide 3!
data.detailed_description:
A sexy guide for a sexy game featuring a sexy heroine!

It contains a walkthrough with maps of the game and several hints and tips to complete it.

To make sure you've installed our DLC properly, go to your Steam client and click on:
Sexy Heroine! Part 3 > Properties > DLC

To use the DLC click on the following link and check the folder Sexy Guide:
Sexy Heroine! Part 3 > Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
